name: Jumpgirl's Adventure
description:
This is mostly unfinished and it will probably remain unfinished for the foreseeable future. This is my first game and I've spent way too long on it so I've decided to just dump it for people to play. Hope you enjoy!

Controls:

Horizontal Movement = Arrow, WASD Keys

Jump/Wall Jump = Up, W, or Space Keys

Pause/Options Menu = P Key

Select = Mouse Right Click/Space

Fullscreen Toggle = F Key

Credits:

Grasslands Music: https://www.epidemicsound.com/track/4TNmzQpENe/

Caves Music:  https://www.epidemicsound.com/track/b5HuKd2Vwg/

Boss Music: https://www.epidemicsound.com/track/H6QWaMKzjr/

Whitehead Theme:  https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/1135174?updated=1654028520

Thanks to Gonkee for the base for the Player Follow AI: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WXC8eBCEbho&t=1250s

The source files for this version of  the game have been lost, so if there is a next version, it will probably have several noticeable changes. 

Made in Godot 3.4, thanks for playing!
